params.name: input_values
params.description: Float values of the input audio waveform.

params.name: padding_mask
params.description: Padding mask used to pad the input_values.

params.name: bandwidth
params.description: The target bandwidth. Must be one of config.target_bandwidths. If None, uses the smallest possiblebandwidth. bandwidth is represented as a thousandth of what it is, e.g. 6kbps bandwidth is representedas bandwidth == 6.0
